### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  receipt_url VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL,
  submitted_by VARCHAR(100),
  submitted_date DATE
)


CREATE TABLE approvals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expense_id INT,
  approver VARCHAR(100),
  approval_date DATE,
  approved BOOLEAN
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE expenses SET amount = 500 WHERE id = 1;

)

 status VARCHAR(50)
)

 id INT PRIMARY KEY,

 approved_by INT,

 reimbursement_date DATE
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE receipts (
    receipt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    expense_type TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE approvals (
    approval_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    manager_id INT,
    receipt_id INT,
    approval_date DATE,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reimbursements (
    reimbursement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    request_date DATE,
    approval_id INT,
    payment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT,
    department TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE managers (
    manager_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT,
    department TEXT
);
